attributes.action: We, the British public do not want Jeremy Hunt to be considered for PM.
attributes.background:
We, the British public demand that Jeremy Hunt is not considered or supported to run for Prime Minister. We have lost faith in him as a Health Secretary, MP and he does not act in the interests of our great country. 

We demand a strong candidate who is passionate to take our nation forward.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
